ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Getting really Annoyed
ygData.msgSnippet: I read the everwhine boards, the eqcaster s boards, and the vault boards pretty regularly.  I don t believe Verant really uses the info at their disposal to
ygData.messageBody:
I read the everwhine boards, the eqcaster's boards, and the vault boards
pretty regularly. I don't believe Verant really uses the info at their
disposal to make those judgments correctly. That's the whole point. They
do have the info and I think they still make stupid decisions.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeffrey Sue [mailto:jsue@...]
Sent: Thursday, August 24, 2000 11:23 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Getting really Annoyed


At 10:50 AM 8/24/00 -0600, you wrote:

>I was only counting the people I know in RL personally. I doubt anyone
>knows an appropriate sample size in that way. From seeing the boards
>though, there are hundreds of posts on bard song bugs, very few on having
>one's own corpse poof.
>
> Kit


that's the point. none of us can know how big the problem really is. we
don't
have enough data. but verant can and does. which is why they prioritize
the bug
fixes/feature adds and we don't. when you say ''from seeing the boards'', i
assume
you go to all the class specific and the sony boards and you don't see
hundreds of
posts from other classes on bugs or people posting on general bugs that need
fixing
too? or do you just read the bard board?


Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
